body.p: However, the IFRIC also concluded that this outcome was not consistent with the Board’s approach when it introduced the ‘fixed for fixed’ notion in IAS 32. Therefore, the IFRIC decided to recommend that the Board amend IAS 32 to permit a conversion or stand‑alone option to be classified as equity if the exercise price was fixed in any currency. In September 2005 the Board decided not to proceed with the proposed amendment.
